message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the refinement of 3D surface meshes using semantic information and calibrated images. This involves computer vision (CV) techniques such as semantic segmentation and multiview reconstruction, as well as graphics (GR) techniques such as mesh deformation and energy minimization. The use of shape priors and MRF inference suggests a focus on optimization (RO) and machine learning (MM) methods. Finally, the evaluation of the proposed method on real and synthetic data suggests a potential application in data analysis and machine learning (LG).
